name: Birthday Puzzle
description:
Fun for all ages with over 100 levels!
Match the boxes of the same colour to complete the level.
You will have to use maximum brain power to advance between carefully designed levels!
We also have 2 game modes Action and Arcade for you to rest your brain following the challenging Puzzle mode.
Don't forget to play these two modes to practice and collect coins!
Complete your gifts collection as you go up and unlock higher difficulty levels.


-------------------------------

Birthday Puzzle Features:

- Over 100 levels, and many more to come!
- Game experience that starts off easy and then increases in difficulty.
- Ask your friends for gifts or send them gifts!
- 3 collections, each including 10 gifts
- Local or International Scoreboards
- Hints to help you through the game
publishers: Mobil Interaktif Bilisim Hizmetleri Anonim Sirketi
